welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ann Arbor, where the charm of a vibrant college town meets the beauty of nature. Explore our renowned cultural and culinary scene, and immerse yourself in the unique spirit of this wonderful city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Sadako Japanese Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sadako Japanese Restaurant is a sushi restaurant located in Ann Arbor.
restaurants.address: 1321 S University Ave (btwn Washtenaw & Forest), Ann Arbor, MI 48104

restaurants.name: Rich JC
restaurants.description: Rich JC is a korean restaurant located in Ann Arbor.
restaurants.address: 1313 S University Ave (S Forest Ave), Ann Arbor, MI 48104

restaurants.name: Maize N Blue Deli
restaurants.description: Maize N Blue Deli is a sandwich spot located in Ann Arbor.
restaurants.address: 1329 S University Ave (at Washtenaw Ave), Ann Arbor, MI 48104

restaurants.name: Pizza House
restaurants.description: Pizza House is a pizzeria located in Ann Arbor.

restaurants.name: Joe's Pizza NYC

restaurants.address: 1107 S University Ave, Ann Arbor, MI 48104

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, featuring modern facilities and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lenawee County Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lenawee County Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
